name: Scoold Q&A
description: An open-source questions and answers platform inspired by Stack Overflow.

scoold_host_url.description: The public URL of Scoold (affects CSP header), which will be the main entry point of your site, e.g. https://scoold.herokuapp.com

scoold_is_default_space_public.description: Controls the visibility of questions, answers and users in the default space. Public by default.

scoold_app_secret_key.description: A secret string for this particular app (any random string)

scoold_meta_keywords.value: scoold, knowledge sharing, collaboration, wiki, forum, Q&A, questions and answers, stackoverflow clone

scoold_meta_description.value: Scoold is an open source Q&A platform written in Java.

scoold_gmaps_api_key.description: Google Maps API key for showing a map for geolocation filtering of posts.

scoold_admins.description: Administrator identifiers - comma-separated list admin identifiers, used to recognize user as admin (can be an email or a social id).

scoold_password_auth_enabled.description: Enable or disable basic authentication with an email and password.

scoold_fb_app_id.description: Facebook APP ID (for login with Facebook)

scoold_gp_app_id.description: Google OAuth client id (for login with Google)

scoold_gh_app_id.description: GitHub OAuth client id (for login with GitHub)

scoold_in_app_id.description: LinkedIn OAuth client id (for login with LinkedIn)

scoold_tw_app_id.description: Twitter OAuth client id (for login with Twitter)

scoold_ms_app_id.description: Microsoft OAuth client id (for login with Microsoft)

scoold_security_ldap_bind_dn.description: LDAP bind DN for connections to server

scoold_security_ldap_bind_pass.description: LDAP bind password for connections to server

scoold_security_ldap_active_directory_do.description: LDAP Active Directory domain (set this only if you are connecting to AD servers)

scoold_csp_header_enabled.description: Enable or disable the Content-Security-Policy header. Enable this in production for better security.

scoold_csp_header.description: The value of the CSP header (leave blank to use the default value)
